title: How to Use This Blog Platform
content:
# How to Use This Blog Platform

This blog is built to be simple and fully under control. No distractions, no unnecessary features — just a clean space to write, edit, and publish posts in Markdown.

## Creating a Post

- Click on "New Post" in the navigation bar.
- Enter a title and your content in Markdown.
- Press "Publish" to save the post.
- The post gets stored as a JSON file inside the `/posts/` folder.

## Editing or Deleting

- Open any post and you'll see options to edit or delete it.
- The editor provides live Markdown preview using SimpleMDE.
- When edited, the original post file is updated in place.

## Dark Mode

- Click the "Toggle Dark" button in the header.
- The site will switch between light and dark themes.
- Your preference is remembered across sessions.

## Tag Filtering

- You can add tags to your posts using the input field.
- Tags appear under the post title.
- Click on a tag to see only posts with that tag.

## RSS Feed

- You can subscribe using the `/rss.xml` feed.
- It includes all posts with their titles, content, and links.

---

This setup is intentionally minimal so you can modify it however you like. It runs on Flask, Markdown, and plain files — no databases or login systems. Just a writing tool that works.

Check the GitHub repo if you want to fork it or build your own version.
